Model
service in module intermesh.data

Description

A model is an item that can be saved and loaded from the server. A user for example.

Usage

Model(modelName, createRoute, updateRoute, deleteRoute, baseParams);

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
modelNamestring

The name of the modal. eg. "user". This will be used in requests.

createRoutestring

The controller route to create a new model

updateRoutestring

The controller route to update a model

deleteRoutestring

The controller route to delete a model

baseParamsstring

GET parameters for each request

Methods

  • delete()

    Delete the model on the server

    Returns
    HttpPromise

    Returns a HttpPromise. See: https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/service/$http#get

  • delete(params)

    Load the model data from the server but only if not already loaded with the same ID. Useful with detail and edit pages that share the same model.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    paramsobject

    Key value pair of GET params for the request

    Returns
    HttpPromise

    Returns a HttpPromise. See: https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/service/$http#get

  • isModified()

    Check if the model has modified attributes

    Returns
    boolean

    Returns true if the model was modified

  • load(params)

    Load the model data from the server

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    paramsobject

    Key value pair of GET params for the request

    Returns
    HttpPromise

    Returns a HttpPromise. See: https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/service/$http#get

  • loadData(data)

    Load the initial model attributes from the server. Don't set attributes directly because this function makes a copy so the model can be reset to the old attributes.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    dataobject

    to load

  • resetAttributes()

    Reset the attributes to their original state.

  • save()

    Save the model on the server

    Returns
    HttpPromise

    Returns a HttpPromise. See: https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/service/$http#post

Properties

  • attributes

    Returns
    object

    Key value pair of model attributes

  • baseParams

    Returns
    object

    Key value pair of GET parameters to pass on load.
